data.title: Career awareness programme at Silapathar
data.meta_description: In a bid to bring awareness on various career options and opportunities, Utopian Academy at Silapathar organised a day-long career awareness programme for its students on Wednesday. data.text: In a bid to bring awareness on various career options and opportunities, Utopian Academy at Silapathar organised a day-long career awareness programme for its students on Wednesday. The programme was inaugurated by Siddharth Phukan , Director of Utopian Academy and moderated by Lalit Biswakarma , Principal of the college . Ranjan K Baruah of North East Youth Foundation was the resource person who scope on various career avenues for students . He focussed on various attributes , skill required for vibrant career apart from entrance exams which can be appeared by students after senior secondary level of studies. After the presentation by resource person there was discussion and interaction by students with him. Utopian Academy has been conducting career and motivational programme for the benefit of its students since its inception.
